text: @JohnJHarwood It appears to be what they want. Was pleased to see @NYGovCuomo saying they’ll have to quarantine before being allowed into tristate. Could get expensive. *shrug emoji*  How about y’all just stay home. K?  #Cuomosexual #StayHomeStaySafe #coronavirus #COVID19
